meanings.sent1: The innoxious plant posed no danger to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The innoxious substance was safe for children to play with.
meanings.sent3: The innoxious puppy chased its tail in circles, amusing everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an innoxious breeze on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The innoxious kitten purred softly, bringing comfort to the room.

meanings.sent1: The innoxious comment made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: The innoxious joke lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent3: The innoxious prankster played a harmless trick on his friend.
meanings.sent4: Her innoxious giggle was contagious, spreading joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The innoxious butterfly fluttered gracefully in the garden.
